name: Past The End
description:
Past The End...

...is a 2D Adventure RPG with turn-based combat where your choices shape the world around you and influence how the world's inhabitants react to you and your party.

Play as Sam, a young woman who sets out on an adventure to cure her mother of the mysterious Crimson Decay. Sam is accompanied by Michael, the village healer tasked with Sam's safety on her journey to gather the four Elemental Crystals and seal the gate to the Void.  

----------------------------

Past the End is a casual adventure game with heavy inspiration drawn from  RPG's such as Pokémon and the older Final Fantasy games, with world-building elements inspired by the Trails series. 

This is currently the demo for the game's 1st chapter of an intended 5.

Thank you for taking the time to look into our project.

Please report any bugs to PastTheEndGame@gmail.com
